documents.document: @annasproul @colindickey @Paul_The_Cote I...went to a prep school in junior high but then was in an IB magnet program so can I hang out too?
@colindickey Years ago, my husband got into his doctoral program with a thesis on Dr. Seuss. You two need to meet. @Paul_The_Cote
@iamchrisscott This is wonderful news. I'm so proud of you and love you. See you tonight. ❤
@RadMacawesome I'm just doing 2-3 times a day? That's what my artist told me.

Give me a relatively low-stakes task (the tattoo is perfectly fine), and I *will* honor it with my life.
Want to see a neurotic person lose her mind? Observe as she gets a small, simple tattoo and proceeds to obsess over its cleaning regimen.
@rpbp that it even seems possible makes me want to sob.

I used to teach this poem in my queer literature class. It is one of my very favorites and couldn't be more resonant right now.
@helfitzgerald "Every time we kiss / we confirm the new world is coming." Ugh god I love it so much.

Current internal monologue: It's late, you should go to bed. Okay, maybe refresh Twitter a few more times. Just to set your mind at ease.
One thing I miss about the Obama administration is going to bed without worrying that I would wake up to Armageddon.
@GingerConstruct there is a TREMENDOUS amount of Harvey nudity.
Checking in briefly as I refill my mimosa to say that The Piano is a perfect film, and I think you all should watch it.

All this really means for me is that when I'm drunk I have to brace myself against the urge to send really ill-advised emails.
It doesn't necessarily have to be tied to love. I'm just talking big-gestures-last-shot-now-or-never bursts of emotion.
Who else is, when they're not furious and/or terrified, feeling romantic in the apocalyptic way?
@esmewang @PKhakpour As I keep telling everyone, I am too poor to register, but live here and hope to see you for meals/off-site events! <3
@pronounced_ing Oh I really hope we can see each other! I will be around and hoping to catch people for meals and the off-site events.
@pronounced_ing will you be here?? I'm not registered, but will be around for off-site events since I'm local.
We knew that bitch was no ally. I'm just too attached to her damn music.

Me: I literally do not give a shit what Taylor Swift thinks about politics. It's irrelevant. Also me: This is betrayal, you fake feminist!
@nicole_soojung This is the initial vote or THE vote? Either way, I'm spitting mad.
@NOT_TomPetty In any case, I hope you guys are doing ok in the midst of our new national nightmare.
@NOT_TomPetty You would think. He is either very dumb, does not care, or--most likely--some combination of the two.
@pronounced_ing ...and donated to the ACLU <3 #smallacts

I cannot remember the last time I didn't wake up in a panic, grab my phone, and wonder, "What have I missed? What has he done now?!"

No one murdered in the Holocaust--Jews, the disabled, queer folk, so many more--should be named so blithely, with so little respect.
Millions more innocents were cruelly murdered by the Nazis. But the WH's statement is constructed to reference Jews as an afterthought.
